text: guys guys guys!
guess what?
It is my freakin honor to cut the ribbon on this bad boy
tearing up a bit here...bare with me
_dramatic pause_
ok, some folks worked really hard on this and i hope that you all can come.  we will be opening up the rsvp soon, but, without further adieu
<https://devday.splashthat.com/>
poke around and stay tuned for updates!
<@U7SL518D6> probably has more things to say
This is amazing y'all!! Super jelly of those who get to attend :slightly_smiling_face:
not sure why hotdog
but i went with my gut
(stuck a pin in the link) fyi
haha, great intro Dennis

If interested in volunteering/presenting there is a form on the page.

If you and I have talked personally about presenting, you are not required to fill out that form, but I’d recommend it still as you can help shape the event in other ways too!
Make sure to also use the button on the event page to sign up to speak or volunteer!

I  would also say even if you don’t  think you can volunteer, that form does have ways you can affect the event without volunteering so it’s worth filling out. That also applies if you are just going to watch the livestream.
<https://forms.gle/swHuzqdig82dksmZ9>
i would love to help, but our team is also expected to be at partner day, and I’m trying to work out whether I can go to this instead. If I can be there, I’ll sign up to help for a bit.
I will not be in Cambridge coming September 3rd  but hope to tune in online.

<!channel> check out the details + link posted above :point_up_2: about the *INBOUND 2019 Community-Run Developer Meet-Up.*
> - Tuesday September 3rd: 9AM-3PM :robot_face: +  Happy hour 3:30-6PM :beers:
> - Hosted at :sprocket: HubSpot Offices in Cambridge, MA. _(~15 mins from the INBOUND conference center)._
> - Learn and collaborate with other community devs + HubSpotters
> - See the new products and dev tooling in the works and chat with the HubSpot Product Team building the tools you use every day.
> - Hang out with <@UD53A9UUR>

It's going to be amazing :bmo::beers:

Also, this is a community-run event _(sponsored by HubSpot)_. Make sure to thank the community organizer team for their hard work to make this happen (<@U2H3TT8F2> <@UD53A9UUR> <@U25PYL3Q8> <@U7SL518D6> <@U26BLKGE4>) :clapping::clapping:  They have been using their nights and weekends to make this event for the community. :slightly_smiling_face:

They are setting the stage for more HubSpot Developer community-run events around the world in 2019 and beyond. :earth_americas::sprocket:

Hey <@U22PKFRU5> I add <@UFHB0N56Y> my brillant dev because I won’t be able to go to Boston this year but Germain will. Thanks a lot to <@U2H3TT8F2> <@U25PYL3Q8> <@UD53A9UUR> <@U7SL518D6> and <@U26BLKGE4>. You’re amazing HubSpot CMS Ambassadors and thanks for this DEV event !
